content.description: Same Start as peace pipe, but mantel directly up over the top. The mantel move is on good holds however the ledge that you exit onto is small (about a foot and a half wide) and typically overgrown with ferns if not recently cleaned off. Would be an unpleasant fall if not committed to the move completely.Â

Sit start low with hands matched on the obvious rail, pull up and get the right hand in the undercling, then match (I've tried many many times but it only goes if you match). Bump both hands up to the flake, and then campus or traverse left. topout where the ledge ends.
content.protection: One pad is probably fine, just mind the topout.
content.location: Route starts to the left of the peace sign.

content.description: This spot is one of the few that gets sun, and is very secluded. Rock quality is decent but lots of vegetation means that this area still needs cleaning to really get all the possible climbs out of it.
